definition: in the direction of the sea, directed or situated away from inland regions and toward the sea or coast, the direction toward the sea
details:
adverb
- in the direction of the sea
= example: in the direction of the sea
= synonyms: seawards, asea
adjective
- directed or situated away from inland regions and toward the sea or coast
= example: directed or situated away from inland regions and toward the sea or coast
- (of winds) coming from the sea toward the land
= synonyms: onshore
- (of winds) coming from the land
= synonyms: offshore
noun
- the direction toward the sea
